name: Ver 2.4.5
body:
* Enhance child views can handle touch events https://github.com/recruit-lifestyle/FloatingView/pull/120
* Android X https://github.com/recruit-lifestyle/FloatingView/pull/121

Thank you to @ynntk4815 and @hannesa2 for pull requests!

name: Ver 2.4.4
body:
- Enable hardware acceleration by default #115
    - Fix #102

name: Ver 2.4.3
body: - getDisplayCutout() on a null object reference #110

name: Ver 2.4.2
body:
- NullPointerException on mVelocityTracker(#103 )
- Fix sample app

name: Ver 2.4.1
body: - Fix "addViewToWindow() crashes with IllegalStateException"( #100 )

name: Ver 2.4.0
body:
- Update SDK
    - support library 28.0.0
- Support Android P(#82)
    - [Foreground service permission](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/pie/android-9.0-changes-28#fg-svc)
```  <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE" /> ```
    - [DisplayCutout](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/view/DisplayCutout.html)
        Use ``` FloatingViewManager.findCutoutSafeArea(activity) ```
- Bugs on Galaxy S9+ (#88)
   - dirty hack...
- Fix FloatingViewManager.removeAllViewToWindow() causes IllegalArgumentException (#89)

All changes [here](https://github.com/recruit-lifestyle/FloatingView/commit/f549e30d704f66c672e75423e576f06906c0f1c3)

name: Ver 2.4.0-beta02
body: - Fix FloatingViewManager.removeAllViewToWindow() causes IllegalArgumentException (#89)

name: Ver 2.4.0-beta01
body:
- Update SDK
    - support library 28.0.0
- Add method about DisplayCutout.
    -  `FloatingViewManager.findCutoutSafeArea(activity)`
- Bugs on Galaxy S9+ (#88)
   - dirty hack...

name: Ver 2.4.0-alpha01
body:
- Support Android P(#82)
    - [Foreground service permission](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/pie/android-9.0-changes-28#fg-svc)
```  <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE" /> ```
    - [DisplayCutout](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/view/DisplayCutout.html)
        - But... it has constraints ([See No 9](https://github.com/recruit-lifestyle/FloatingView/blob/develop/README.md#how-to-use))

name: Ver 2.3.2
body:
- Update sdk
- use implementation keyword

Thank you @TurboProgramming

name: Ver 2.3.1
body: FloatingView moves smoothly(#19)

name: Ver 2.3.0
body:
Note: Physics-based animation is turned on by default from this version
If it is unnecessary, turn it off as an option
#68 #44

name: Ver 2.2.4
body: Fix #68

name: Ver 2.2.3
body:
Support Android O
(Use Android Studio 3.0)
- targetSdkVersion 25 -> 26
- Update libraries
- Use NotificationChannel
- New foreground service API (ContextCompat.startForegroundService)
- New window layer (TYPE_APPLICATION_OVERLAY)

name: Ver 2.2.3-beta1
body:
Beta release
# Support Android O(#34)
- targetSdkVersion 25 -> 26
- Update libraries
- Use NotificationChannel
- New foreground service API (`ContextCompat.startForegroundService`)
- New window layer (TYPE_APPLICATION_OVERLAY)

name: Ver 2.2.2
body:
- Supports `MOVE_DIRECTION_NEAREST ` (move the nearest side)
- Bug Fix
  #39
  #41
  #42

name: Ver 2.2.2-beta1
body:
# Deprecated(Use 2.2.2 or higher)
- Supports `MOVE_DIRECTION_NEAREST ` (move the nearest side)
- Bug Fix
  #39
  #41
  #42

If you find the  some bugs, please report on issue page
We will run a few weeks of testing and the official version will be released.

name: Ver 2.2.1
body:
Minor update(sample module only)

- Change the way to stop the service

name: Ver 2.2
body:
- Support for large image for FloatingView (not complete, but almost works)(#16)
- Support size specification of FloatingView(#16)
- Fix issue #14

name: Ver 2.1
body:
- Add FloatingView’s position callback and update demo
- Add annotations
- Update library version

name: Ver 2.0
body:
Ver 2.0
- Update sample code
- Delete deprecated method
- Support initial animation
- Delete vibrate permission
- Update support library version(24.2.0)
- Update AndroidStudio version(2.1.3)
